comments.content: And if you want something with clean contours: [Adobe Caslon Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203195645/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/adobe_caslon_pro_italic_ot/?acs=1&acs_ss=20).
